RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUSTIN AWAY stumbled at the start but broke on top despite it, showed the way lightly coaxed just off the inside down the backstretch under pressure from AGGELOS THE GREAT to the outside, settled in hand coming under a firm left grip through the turn remaining just off the inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and continued in the two path into upper stretch under threat from a pair, dug in between foes through the final furlong getting brushed by AGGELOS THE GREAT a sixteenth out and gamely fended off the pair to prevail by a head on the wire. MISCHIEF JOKE broke out a step at the start and was corrected, chased three then two wide from just off the pace, angled in to take the inside route into upper stretch roused for the drive issuing a challenge for the front, dug in head to head through to the finish fighting on gamely but was ultimately bested at the end. AGGELOS THE GREAT hustled from the gate, prompted the pace four then three wide, got let out spinning three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive latched on to the outside of the top pair, came in slightly and brushed BUSTIN AWAY near the sixteenth marker, then got shaken off in the late stages while clear for the show honors. SPLIT STRIKE just off the pace in pursuit four to five wide, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late going. JAKE'S ORCHARD chased three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, angled out six wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals to the finish. EZ ROLL coaxed from the start, chased six then five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch and tired. ERIC FROM MIAMI shied in at the start and came under coaxing, chased three wide, got out five wide under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch and made no impact. MITHRIDATES broke in a step at the start and came under hustling to be forwardly placed along the inside just off the top pair, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch and tired. LOVE THAT BIRD seven then six paths off the inside in pursuit early on, tucked five wide briefly at the half mile pole before tucking to the two path once in the turn, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Mithridates
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased inside, coaxed 5/16, cut corner, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Eric From Miami
ENTRY.COMMENT: shied in st, chased 3w, got out 5w 3/8, 7-8w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Bustin Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumble st, in hand 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4, dug in btw, game

ENTRY.NAME: Aggelos the Great
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, prompted 4-3w, let out 3w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Jake's Orchard
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 7/16, angled 6w upper, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Ez Roll
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 6-5w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Mischief Joke
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp Parkland Thoroughbreds Fowler Barry and Carlesimo Angelo
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out step st, chased 3-2w, ins 1/4, dug in, game, bested

ENTRY.NAME: Split Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace 5-4w, coaxed 5/16, 4-5w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Love That Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6-7w early, to 5p 1/2p, coaxed 2p turn, 4-5w upper, trailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 5 1/2F Turf CR: 100. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 156000. (PURSE $120,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $27,144 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INTO THE SUNRISE came away alertly then was hustled, angled in while going to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, controlled the action along the rail on the turn, responded well when asked at the quarter-pole, came under a left-handed crop in upper stretch, remained clear into the final sixteenth and held under strong urging. FAUCI came away in good order then quickly dropped back while showing no speed, angled in late on the backstretch, shifted from the rail to the three path under urging early on the turn, swung five wide into the stretch, rallied outside into the final furlong, swapped back to his inside lead outside the sixteenth-pole and finished fast but was too late while up for the place. FLUID SITUATION steadied briefly in the early going, was rated just off the pace on the inside, drafted along the rail on the turn, was given his cue at the quarter-pole, moved off the rail inside the three-sixteenths, pursued the winner into the final sixteenth, gained on that foe late and earned the show. COMEDY TOWN angled out early, tracked the pace on the outside then in the two path on the turn, was asked near the quarter-pole, chased the winner under a drive in the stretch and lacked the needed kick. KING ANGELO broke out then was slowest into stride, settled towards the rear, went around the turn in the two path, was roused four wide into the stretch, swapped back to his inside lead inside the furlong marker and gained some but failed to threaten. SOUPER SUCCESS was carried out early, settled comfortably on the outside, was roused three wide on the turn, dropped back into upper stretch and lacked the needed response.

ENTRY.NAME: King Angelo
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,slw into stride,2p turn,roused 4w1/4,some gain

ENTRY.NAME: Fluid Situation
ENTRY.COMMENT: stdied briefly early,ratd inside,ask1/4,mvd out ins3/16,chsd,gain

ENTRY.NAME: Comedy Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled out early,tracked outside,2p turn,asked1/4,outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Souper Success
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out early,settled outside,3w turn,lckd needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Into the Sunrise
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,angled in,showed way,ins trn,ask1/4,left-handed crop,held

ENTRY.NAME: Fauci
ENTRY.OWNER: Lindy Farms and Ice Wine Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed,drop back,mvd in7/16,ins-3w turn,5w1/4,finished fast

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 1M Inner turf CR: 78. Maiden Claiming Purse 60000. INNER TURF (UP TO $10,440 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $75,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 18 fee t).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVER TAY (IRE) three wide through the first turn, raced three wide down the backstretch before tipping briefly to the two path with seven-sixteenths to go, tipped back three wide through the far turn and came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued three wide into upper stretch rallying to issue a challenge nearing the eighth pole, had the rider lose the handle on the crop bouncing it up and nearly caught it a furlong out just before taking command, dug in under hands and heels only among a host in a blanket finish to the wire getting bumped just inside the sixteenth marker by VOLATILITY and then returning the bump two strides after and held gamely to the finish kept to task. CATSKILL HUMOR broke a half a beat slow, chased two then three wide through the first turn before chasing two to three wide down the backstretch settled near the rear of the field, came under coaxing nearing the quarter pole and angled out five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive jostling KATIE'S CHECKRIDE and bouncing that foe around in tandem with ST. BENEDICTS PREP just inside the eighth pole, then offered up a late surge in tandem with LOOKINFORBARGAINS and missed loosely between foes at the end. LOOKINFORBARGAINS settled along the inside at the tail of the field through the first turn before tipping two to three wide down the backstretch, tucked inside once more through the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out six wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive holding her lane through to the finish surging late in concert with the aforementioned foe and missed on the line. VOLATILITY just off the inside through the opening turn, chased two to three wide down the backstretch and then three wide through the far turn coming under coaxing nearing the quarter pole, swung five then four wide straightened away into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge a furlong out, dug in under a drive bumping RIVER TAY just inside the sixteenth marker while threatening for command, then got bumped two strides thereafter by that rival while among a host of rivals latched on to the finish and ran on to the wire missing at the end. ST. BENEDICTS PREP tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and jostled and bounced around KATIE'S CHECKRIDE in tandem with CATSKILL HUMOR just inside the eighth pole, angled in when spying a large lane opening and darted to it but was outfinished. KATIE'S CHECKRIDE coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside until tipped out to the two path nearing the five-sixteenths placed to coaxing, swung four then three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive behind rivals looking for a seam when getting bumped and jostled and bounced between CATSKILL HUMOR to the outside and ST. BENEDICTS PREP to the inside, made no headway to the finish. DREAM FLY grew rank under restraint early on off the heels of KATIE'S CHECKRIDE, settled once able to tip to the two path with clearance midway on the first turn, tracked along the inside from near the rear of the field, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, steadied in behind foes bumping just inside the eighth pole and then offered no kick. WONDER GIRL coaxed from the gate, prompted the pace from the two path coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. NURSEKRINGLEDANCES showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, yielded the front nearing the eighth pole and weakened in the late going.

ENTRY.NAME: St. Benedicts Prep
ENTRY.OWNER: Dubb Michael Madaket Stables LLC and Caruso Michael J
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coax near 1/4, 3w uppr, jostled foe 1/8, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Lookinforbargains
ENTRY.OWNER: Louis Lazzinnaro LLC Dubb Michael and Caruso Michael J
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w at rear, coaxed ins 3/8, angled 6w upper, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Dream Fly
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank early ins, tracked ins, 4-5w upper, steady ins 1/8, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Catskill Humor
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 slw, 3-2w pursuit, coaxed near 1/4, 5w upper, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Katie's Checkride
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, 2p 5/16, 4-3w uppr, bounced btw 1/8p

ENTRY.NAME: Nursekringledances
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4p, yielded near 1/8, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Volatility
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p 1st trn, 2-3w pursuit, 5-4w uppr, dug in, traded bumps, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Wonder Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, prompted 2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: River Tay (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 3w uppr, lost crop, up 1/8, dug in, game

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 72000. (UP TO $12,528 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $32,000 Or Less Not Considered I n Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).

CLAIM.OWNER: Two B and One C Stable

RACE.FOOTNOTES: HYDRA moved up near the five-eighths pole to press the pace on the inside of the leader, was eased back off the pace late on the backstretch, raced inside to the two path on the turn, was roused four wide into the stretch, rallied to the lead coming to the furlong marker and edged clear under strong urging. EVERYONELOVESLINDA went to the front, showed the way under some pressure, dropped from the two path to the rail on the turn, was urged late on that bend, lost the advantage into upper stretch, fought with two foes into the final furlong and was out-finished while clear for the place. AWESOME INDRA was hustled from the start, moved out under urging, chased four wide on the turn, was driven five wide into the stretch, drifted in late then was taken in hand and got up for the show. QUICK MUNNY showed good speed while remaining well out in the track, moved in late on the backstretch, vied in the three path on the turn, took the advantage while set down into upper stretch, was headed by the winner coming to the furlong marker and weakened then was caught for the show. I'M BUZZY settled under some urging, dropped back leaving the backstretch, moved from the three path to the five path on the turn, came seven wide into the stretch, remained on her inside lead until inside the furlong marker then swapped to the proper lead and failed to threaten. CUSTOMEREXPERIENCE settled off the pace, was urged two then three wide on the turn, spun six wide into the stretch and failed to rally. TRIPLE P moved out towards the rear early then settled on the far outside, went four then five wide on the turn, dropped to the three path late on that bend, came five wide into the stretch and was no factor. ICY STARE DOWN drifted out at the start, settled off the pace, was urged three to four wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Hydra
ENTRY.OWNER: Scuderi Vincent S and Imperio Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd up 5/8,press ins,eased back1/2,ins-2p,4w1/4,lead1/8,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Everyoneloveslinda
ENTRY.OWNER: Rudina Stable and K Five Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,2path-ins turn,ask5/16,headed3/16,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Indra
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,mvd out,urged,chased 4w turn,5w1/4,drift in late,up3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Customerexperience
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, urged 2-3path turn, 6wide into lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Stare Down
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out brk,settled,3-4wide turn,6w into lane,no response

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Buzzy
ENTRY.OWNER: Curcio Robert Pharm Boys LLC O'Grady Dennis and Bracco Ronald
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled some urging,drop back 1/2,3-5w turn,7w1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Triple P
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd out early,settled outside,4-5wide,3w late trn,5w1/4,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Quick Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,well out in track,3path turn,lead3/16,headed1/8,wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 95000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COLLOQUY three wide through the first turn, chased four then three wide from just off the pace, advanced in hand through the far turn latching on the top pair three furlongs from home, took over command just inside the five-sixteenths, swung three then two wide into upper stretch, drew clear under a drive to prevail. JACKSON HEIGHTS coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside until tipped out three wide half a mile from home, went five wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued five wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to secure the place honors. BETA coaxed from the start, showed the way in hand just off the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths under pressure from a pair and now between foes, yielded the front just inside the five-sixteenths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and kept on to preserve the show honors. KAZ PALACE broke out at the start hitting the off side stall and bumping DR. MARBOOZ and then got bumped between foes when SON OF AN EX came outwards, chased along the inside just off the leader, advanced placed to coaxing half a mile from home and issued a challenge inside a pair along a tight seam on the rail three furlongs out, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. SOUNDS SPOOKY just off the inside in aim of the front through the first turn, chased three then two wide down the backstretch, tipped four wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued four wide into upper stretch and weakened. ACH DU LIEBER chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, made no impact. SON OF AN EX broke out at the start bumping KAZ PALACE against DR. MARBOOZ, chased just off the inside through the first turn and then four paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the rail through the far turn under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, made no impact, then got vanned off after the finish. DR. MARBOOZ got bumped at the start by KAZ PALACE breaking outwards, grew rank under restraint into the first turn spinning to the two path, settled in pursuit just off the inside down the backstretch and through the far turn coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, tired, and was eased through the final furlong to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Son of an Ex
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 4w backstretch, to ins 1/2, 2w 1/4, no impact, vanned

ENTRY.NAME: Kaz Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, bumped betw st, chased ins, ins 1/4, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Marbooz
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, rank into 1st trn, chased 2p, 2w 1/4p, tired, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Jackson Heights
ENTRY.OWNER: Zilla Racing Stables Black Jack Racing LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, tip out 1/2, 5w 3/8, 5w uppr, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Beta
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, coaxed 7/16, yielded, 2-3w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Sounds Spooky
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p 1st turn in aim, chased 3-2w, coaxed 4w 3/8, 4w uppr, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Colloquy
ENTRY.OWNER: Murray Robert E and Lyden Michael P
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, 4-3w pursuit, advanced 3/8, 3-2w uppr, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Ach Du Lieber
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 3w upper, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 1 3/8M Inner turf CR: 91. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. INNER TURF (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FARADAY angled in towards the rear while taken in hand, was reserved towards the back in the two then three path, came under encouragement in the four path on the final turn, spun five wide into the stretch then leaned inward a bit, rallied into the final furlong, dove in from behind horses while closing fast into the final sixteenth and got up inside a bumping duo in the final strides to prevail. SMART UNCLE was bumped in the hindquarters at the start, went to the front, showed the way on the inside, lost the lead briefly outside the seven-eighths pole, regained the advantage on the second turn, moved clear with five furlongs to run, was asked with a half-mile to go, saved ground around the final turn, spun off the rail under pressure into the stretch, responded well under a drive into the final sixteenth, came out one path under a left-handed crop four strides from the wire and bumped hard with SWORE who had drifted in several paths to come alongside, was taken up through the contact and denied but just held second. SWORE was reserved while saving ground through the first two turns, came under urging in the two path on the final turn, swung five wide into the stretch under a left-handed crop, rallied outside into the final furlong, began to drift in when flashed with a right-handed crop coming to the sixteenth-pole, was given one pop of a right-handed crop into the final sixteenth, came in three paths more while coming to SMART UNCLE under hand-urging, collided while meeting up with that foe who came out one path four strides from the wire, was taken up while recovering and just missed but was clear for the show. TOOFAREASTISWEST settled on the outside in the three to four path without the benefit of cover, was roused on the final turn, gained to make an outside bid in upper stretch, battled under a drive into the final furlong and was out-kicked. TYPHOON LAGOON was hustled from the gate, went three wide on the first turn, settled just off the pace in the two path, was asked near the five-sixteenths pole, turned into upper stretch under a drive and lacked the needed response. SACRED RHYME broke in and bumped with a foe then was taken up, was reserved at the rear while inside to the two path, moved from the three path to the five path on the final turn, came six wide into the stretch and was no factor. ASTHROS was asked some leaving the gate, went four then three wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, traveled around the second turn in the two path, was roused three wide on the final turn then driven four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. WILD GUESS stalked the pace on the outside in the three path, drifted out while passing the wire for the first time, took a brief and short lead outside the seven-eighths then lost the advantage again, dropped back with five furlongs to run, chased inside on the final turn and tired. PILKINGTON moved in while taken under a tight hold near the back, saved ground around the first two turns, was reserved towards the rear, went around the final turn in the two path, spun three wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. BEE WELL was away awkwardly then hustled, went around the first turn in the two path, was well placed just off the pace on the inside, came under urging late on the backstretch, dropped back while crowded some with three furlongs to run and faltered. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY AND A JOCKEY CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF SWORE ALLEGING INTERFERENCE FROM SMART UNCLE NEARING THE WIRE, SMART UNCLE WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM SECOND AND PLACED THIRD

ENTRY.NAME: Swore
ENTRY.COMMENT: rsrvd ins,ask2p3rd,5w1/4,rally,drft in1/16,bmp hrd late,tkn up

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Smart Uncle
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk,ins,headed briefly7/8,clr5/8,bmp hard late,tkn up,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Sacred Rhyme
ENTRY.OWNER: Brant Peter M Magnier Mrs John Tabor Michael B Smith Derrick Westerberg and Poul
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in,bmpd,tkn up,at rear,3-5w3rd turn,6w into lane,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Bee Well
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkwrd brk,hustled,2p1st,well placed,ins,ask1/2,drp back3/8,faltr

ENTRY.NAME: Typhoon Lagoon
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,3p1st,just off pace 2p,ask5/6,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Pilkington
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight hold,angled in,ins-2path,reserved,3w into lane,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Asthros
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3p1st,settled,2p2nd,roused 3p3rd turn,4w 1/4,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Guess
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3path,drift out wire 1st time,led briefly7/8,ins3rd,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Faraday
ENTRY.OWNER: Lawrence William H and Woodslane Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,reserved 2-3p,ask4w3rd turn,5w1/4,rally,dove in1/16,up

ENTRY.NAME: Toofareastiswest
ENTRY.OWNER: Braverman Paul Pinch Timothy and Gold Square LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,3-4path,no cover,ask3rd,bid3/16,outkicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 5 1/2F Turf CR: 94. Allowance Purse 95000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DISARMED coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside from just off the pace coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command just inside the three-sixteenths, came in near the eighth pole forcing COURAGEOOUS OH LA to steady in behind, dug in tussling with HONOR AMONG MEN to the finish and was joined by the runner up outside in the final sixteenth and held gamely to prevail. CITY MISCHIEF got brushed at the start by KREESA breaking outwards, chased three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge inside the final furlong, bobbled inside the sixteenth marker, then again more heavily seventy yards from the finish and once more nearing the finish knocking the rider out of the right side iron and was willingly up for the place honors in the final jump. HONOR AMONG MEN coaxed from the gate, dueled three then two wide, got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, got headed for the front just inside the three-sixteenths, came out slightly a furlong out and fought on inside latched on to the finish and was along clear for the show honors. KREESA broke out at the start brushing CITY MISCHIEF, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun three wide for home and offered up a mild kick. COURAGEOOUS OH LA chased along the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung three wide into upper stretch and was steadied near the eighth pole as DISARMED came inwards and HONOR AMONG MEN came out slightly, then stayed on one paced through the stretch to the finish. FEATHERS ROAD four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid but was outkicked. NOBLE HUNTSMAN five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path into the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and angled out six wide into upper stretch, made no impact. BRENNAN'S WAR steadied at the start when LITTLE MADDY BROWN came inwards taking over the lane, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled four to five wide for home and made no headway. LITTLE MADDY BROWN broke in at the start taking over the lane of BRENNAN'S WAR and forcing that foe to steady, dueled from the two path down the backstretch and then along the inside through the turn, took the inside route into upper stretch and weakened to the finish. DR. SETTLE'S DREAM chased just off the inside before tucking inside through the turn, got lightly coaxed swinging two to three wide into upper stretch and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Courageoous Oh La
ENTRY.OWNER: Dixon Linda K and Alejandro Hector M
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed along 3/8, 3w upper, steady, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Settle's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, inside turn, lightly coaxed 2-3w uppr, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Brennan's War
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied st, chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 4-5w upper, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: Little Maddy Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, dueled 2p, ins turn, coaxed near 1/4, ins 1/4, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Disarmed
ENTRY.OWNER: Imperio Michael Rodriguez Rudy R and Gurdon Andrew
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coax 5/16, 4w uppr, up ins 3/16, game

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 91. Claiming Purse 80000. (UP TO $13,920 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $40,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).

CLAIM.OWNER: Two B and One C Stable

RACE.FOOTNOTES: PROVE RIGHT angled in entering the main-track, tracked the pace on the outside, turned up the pressure in the three path on the turn, took the lead just inside the three-eighths pole, shook clear coming to the quarter-pole then spun four wide into the stretch, was given one tap of a down-turned crop at the furlong marker then one pop of a right-handed crop outside the sixteenth-pole and proved best under a brisk hand-ride from that point to the finish. WARRIOR RICHARD settled off the pace, was roused three wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and secured the place while unable to threaten the winner. STREET SWAGG was ridden along off the pace, traveled four wide on the turn, was driven five wide into the stretch under the crop and lacked the needed kick while well clear for the show. DANGEROUS RIDE was hustled from the gate, moved in while showing speed, pressed the pace on the outside of the leader, passed the half-mile pole on even terms for the advantage, vied between horses under urging in the two path on the turn, dropped back late on that bend and weakened. DEVIL'S CAY moved up after the start, set the pace under pressure to his outside, vied along the rail on the turn, lost the lead near the three-eighths, dropped back late on the bend and tired. I RUN settled off the pace, moved closer near the nine-sixteenths, chased in the two path on the turn, dropped back near the five-sixteenths, moved out in upper stretch and capitulated. SOUND DOCTRINE moved out entering the main-track, settled on the outside, was urged five wide on the turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Cay
ENTRY.OWNER: Anthony George Roman Lawrence P Basile Stephen Emerald Upstate Stable and Danzus
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd up,inside pace,inside foe,rail turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: I Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: settld,closer4-1/2,chsd 2p turn,drop back5/16,mvd out3/16,empty

ENTRY.OWNER: AB Racing LLC and Crown Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,roused 3wide turn,chased,secured place

ENTRY.NAME: Dangerous Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,mvd in,pressed,even1/2,btwn 2path turn,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sound Doctrine
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out 6-1/2,outside,5wide turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Street Swagg
ENTRY.COMMENT: ridden along, 4wide turn, 5wide into lane, lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Prove Right
ENTRY.OWNER: Chapman, James K. and Tsujimoto, Stuart
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in 6-1/2,tracked outside,3p turn,lead ins3/8,clr4p1/4,held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 9 1M Inner turf CR: 93. Claiming Purse 55000. INNER TURF (UP TO $9,570 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Du e At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREDO hustled from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside through sensible splits, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths under pressure for the initial time, spun just off the inside at the quarter pole and then straightened away to the rail edging clear to the eighth pole, dug in and held safe to the finish. SKI PATROL chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide for home, ran on to secure the place honors. HARRY HOOD got clipped behind after the start by LUCKY LUKCY LUKE when rivals on each side came together, raced three wide through the first turn, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, ran on to procure the show honors. MISTER ABARRIO chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, kept on to the finish. ARUBA chased three then two wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled five wide for home and stayed on one paced to the wire. TIZ A GIANT broke out at the start and put the squeeze on a pair of rivals just after the start in tandem with pressure from ACAMAR to the outside, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened in the late going. GAMER struck the near side stall at the start then got squeezed out between rivals just after the start, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six to seven wide into upper stretch and offered no rally. STJAMES chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. ACAMAR came in after the start and squeezed back LUCKY LUCKY LUKE and GAMER against pressure inside from TIZ A GIANT forcing LUCKY LUCKY LUKE to clip the back of HARRY HOOD, raced four then three wide through the first turn before chasing four then three wide from just off pace, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, went three to four wide at the head of the stretch and tired. LUCKY LUCKY LUKE got squeezed between foes and clipped the back of HARRY HOOD after the start bobbling and conceding five to six lengths to the front, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Aruba
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, one paced

ENTRY.OWNER: Gyarmati Leah Brooklyn Racing Co and Windborne Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Amsterdam S. - Grade2 SARATOGA RACE 10 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 112. Stakes Purse 200000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $200 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,000 to pass the entry box and an additional $1,000 to start. For hors es not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $1,000 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to f ifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 124 lbs. Non-winners of a Graded sweepstake in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of a sweepstake allowed 4 lbs.; of two races other than maiden, claiming, starter or State-bred allowance in 2023 allow ed 6 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, July 15, 2023 with 15 Original Nominations and 1 Supplement.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEW YORK THUNDER angled in while blazing to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, vied in the two path while challenged to his outside on the turn, shook clear when set down into upper stretch, responded well when put to a left-handed crop inside the three-sixteenths, drew off under the crop while remaining on his inside lead into the final sixteenth, swapped to the proper lead about seventy yards from the wire then was eased up while much the best. DEER DISTRICT brushed with a rival multiple times at the start then was taken in hand briefly, settled under some urging, saved ground while put to stronger encouragement on the turn, moved off the rail under a drive in upper stretch and got up for the place at the wire. DREW'S GOLD moved out in the early going, tracked then chased the pace on the outside, made a bid outside of the winner in the three path midway through the turn, lost touch with that foe into upper stretch, chased under the crop into the final furlong and proved no match then was caught for the place at the wire while weakening. GILMORE brushed with a rival a couple times at the start then was taken up while in tight between horses, dropped well behind the rest of the field, went around the turn in the two path, spun four wide into the stretch then moved further out and failed to threaten. RYVIT stumbled at the start, was urged along on the outside, went around the turn in the two path, spun three wide into the stretch and had nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Drew's Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Chapman, James K. and Tsujimoto, Stuart
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd out,tracked outside,chased,bid 3path3/8,no match,lost 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Deer District
ENTRY.OWNER: Bakke James J and Isbister Gerald
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,in hand,settled some urging,ins turn,mvd out3/16,up2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Gilmore
ENTRY.OWNER: SF Racing LLC Starlight Racing Madaket Stables LLC Masterson Robert E Stonestree
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,tkn up btwn,well behind,2p turn,4p1/4,mvd out,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Ryvit
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, urged outside, 2p turn, 3p into lane, empty

ENTRY.NAME: New York Thunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,good speed,pace,2p,shook foe 3/16,drw off,eased up late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 11 1 1/16M Turf CR: 81. Maiden Claiming Purse 52000. (UP TO $9,048 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to r un this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: URGENT FURY coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside safely in front coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, edged away to the eighth pole, dug in and held well and clear to the finish kept to task. SIXWILLBERICH chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors. NOSTALGIC ONE broke out at the start brushing LASTLY in tandem with MISTER MOORE who recovered inwards from a stumble, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the far turn, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung three wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. VARIABLE COST (GB) got floated four wide into the first turn when BAD LARRY tipped out to the two path carrying MISTER MOORE three wide just to his inside, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing nearing the quarter pole, went six wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. TIMO chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and stayed on one paced to the finish. HIGHEST RATED (IRE) settled just off the inside near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. FAST BOAT TO SKYE coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. TWIRLING EXPRESS three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. LASTLY brushed between foes at the start, chased three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled seven wide into upper stretch, made no headway. BAD LARRY just off the inside, briefly went to tuck inside into the first turn and decided against it with a rival along the rail and tipped back to the two path floating MISTER MOORE, VARIABLE COST and FIRE BARON three, four and five wide respectively into the first turn, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled out seven wide into upper stretch and tired. FIRE BARON got floated five wide into the first turn in a chain begun by BAD LARRY in the two path, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. MISTER MOORE stumbled at the start recovering into LASTLY and brushing that rival in tandem with NOSTALGIC ONE, got floated three wide into the first turn by a BAD LARRY and in turn floated VARIABLE COST and FIRE BARON out to the outside, chased three wide until tipped four to five wide through the far turn coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, went seven wide into upper stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Timo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, dug in, one paced

ENTRY.OWNER: Alifyfe Racing LLC and Mawaka Scott
